definition: dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]

sentences.english: Ben: It was all so clinical. Mom, how come you had to go back to work?
sentences.chinese: 这不过是临床上的。妈妈，为啥你非去上班不可呢？

sentences.english: Man red eye, a roar , I want to know why not hit you?
sentences.chinese: 男人红了眼，一声吼，想知道我为啥不打你吗？

sentences.english: For what make people be again harmed dead by the childe after producing good will to the some role?
sentences.chinese: 为啥总要让人对某角色产生了好感后再被公子害死？

sentences.english: It's difficult to expression that got across the language . why?
sentences.chinese: 它很难同过语言来表达，为啥？

sentences.english: Why do the Japanese draw themselves as white?
sentences.chinese: 为啥日本人老爱把自己画成白人？

sentences.english: Why don't you boys form a platoon and march home?
sentences.chinese: 你们这些小伙子为啥不排成一排走队列回家？

sentences.english: This is the reason reason our pare notnts sll the time encourage us to read abundance books.
sentences.chinese: 这是为啥咱们的爸妈终是鼓励咱们要多读书的理由。

sentences.english: Why do you look at me amazed, mother?
sentences.chinese: 你为啥惊讶地望着偶呢，母亲？

sentences.english: Why do we buy a ticket?
For some reason, there were also dance classes going on.
sentences.chinese: 不知为啥，还有在进行中的舞蹈课。

sentences.english: This is the reason why El Shaarawy has not yet taken part in any official Milan match.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为啥他还没在正式比赛中出场的原因。

sentences.english: Before this, I never understood why anyone hitchhiked.
sentences.chinese: 这之前，我一直不能理解为啥有人要搭便车。

sentences.english: Why do you like international basketball-che?
sentences.chinese: 你为啥喜欢国际篮球棋呢？

sentences.english: Then the little boy turned to Joe Biden and said, "I know why people hate you."
sentences.chinese: 然后小孩又转向拜登，我知道为啥人们都恨你。

sentences.english: Why do we like the smell of our own farts?
sentences.chinese: 我们为啥喜欢自己的屁？

definition: why?/for what reason?
gnaw
dialectal equivalent of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
loud noise/shout/suddenly
how?/what?/why?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
surname Yao
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
(question particle for "yes-no" questions)
see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
woolen material

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
no wonder!/so that's why!
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
what's to be done
household/dwelling/family/sb else's house/household business/house of woman's husband-to-be/CL:戶|户[hu4],家[jia1]
other people/sb else/he, she or they/I, me (referring to oneself as "one" or "people")
